definition: to speak/to talk/to converse/to chat/to discuss
to refer to/to speak about/to talk about
to talk (with sb)/to have a conversation/talk/conversation/CL:次[ci4]
to have an informal discussion/CL:次[ci4],個|个[ge4]
to confer/to discuss/to engage in talks

sentences.english: Don't speak in such abstract terms.
sentences.chinese: 不要這樣抽象地談問題。

sentences.english: Well read it, and we'll talk about it some other time, eh.
sentences.chinese: 那好，拿去看吧。我們另找時間談，嗯？

sentences.english: I must have my share in the conversation, if you are speaking of music.
sentences.chinese: 要是你們談音樂，就得有我的份兒。

sentences.english: Talk with children about human bodies and how they work.
sentences.chinese: 和小孩談人類的身體，以及它們怎樣工作。

sentences.english: The third chapter is mainly about the establishment of urban landscapes, artistic language.
sentences.chinese: 第三章，主要是談都市山水畫藝術語言的建立。

sentences.english: He must be permitted to speak of that Paris as though it still existed.
sentences.chinese: 請允許他談那舊時的巴黎，好象它現在仍然存在一樣。

sentences.english: We've only been dating two days; it's nowhere near a marriage.
sentences.chinese: 我們才談了兩個月的戀愛，還談不上結婚的事。

sentences.english: And while we’re talking about chores, the light in the basement burned out.
sentences.chinese: 既然在談家務事，地下室的燈泡燒壞了。

sentences.english: He warned us about the serious situation of Byland Korea.
sentences.chinese: 他向我們談了朝鮮半島的嚴重形勢。

sentences.english: Then Tom turned coolly away, still talking, and took Amy with him.
sentences.chinese: 湯姆冷冰冰地轉身帶着艾美走了，邊走邊和她談着。

sentences.english: WANT to set down some general remarks about tramps .
sentences.chinese: 就流浪漢問題，我想談幾點粗略的看法。

sentences.english: This man talked with Manuel, and money chinked between them.
sentences.chinese: 這人跟曼紐爾談了談，錢在他倆之間叮噹響。

sentences.english: This man talked with Manuel, and money chinked between them.
sentences.chinese: 這人跟曼紐爾談了談，錢在他倆之間叮噹響。

sentences.english: Want to talk about the manufacturing industry of Zi rich, can talk about 3 night on 3 days.
sentences.chinese: 要談淄博的製造業，可以談上三天三夜。

sentences.english: Any question can be discussed under the One-China Principle .
sentences.chinese: 在一箇中國原則下，什麼問題都可以談。

sentences.english: We get absorbed in discussion for several hours every time we meet.
sentences.chinese: 我們每次見面都會入彀地談上幾個小時。

definition: to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
to know/to recognize/to be familiar with/to get acquainted with sb/knowledge/understanding/awareness/cognition
relation/relationship/to concern/to affect/to have to do with/guanxi/CL:個|个[ge4]
to speak/to explain/to negotiate/to emphasise/to be particular about/as far as sth is concerned/speech/lecture
(romantic) love/CL:個|个[ge4],場|场[chang3]/in love/to have an affair
(of a plant) to produce (fruit or seeds)/Taiwan pr. [jie2]
knot/sturdy/bond/to tie/to bind/to check out (of a hotel)
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else
